channel.title: Bounty of the Week – It's a Living
channel.description:
Bounty of the Week – It's a Living Date: January 11, 2020 Session 1 / January 25, 2020 Session 2 / February 8 Session 3 Time: 6:00 pm CST System: Bounty of the Week Number of players: 4 Description:
WANTED: 3-4 DRIVEN CAPABLE INDIVIDUALS WHO CAN GET THE JOB DONE. NO QUESTIONS. NO DISINTEGRATIONS. APPLY NOW.
Bounty hunting is a complicated and dangerous profession. If you do well you can make a profitable living, for a while.
You’re a bounty hunter in the Star Wars universe, post Return of the Jedi timeline. You and your companions work to hunt and turn in bounties for pay against the backdrop of the War, collapse of the Empire, and your own personal battles.
This game will use a hack of Monster of the Week (Powered by the Apocalypse) with special thanks to Rich Rogers for showing the way.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 3 sessions in total.
Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2020-01-11 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"]
Session 1/3 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxMUtOO9l-X9R8Ksgwe Session 2/3 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxMVuAvCaFPnts5wOyG Session 3/3 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxMWLXJ_aPCx1rDegYX
VIDEOS Session 1, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nU_jwj-G_IM

item.title: Bounty of the Week – It's a Living
item.dc:creator: @DavidMK
item.description:
@DavidMK wrote:

Do you have what it takes to make it in a post Empire – pre New Republic galaxy? Apply today!

Due to RL emergency, Bounty of the Week has space for one more player.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LxMWLXJ_aPCx1rDegYX

Saturday, Feb. 8, 6-9PM CST. May the credits be with you!

Read full topic

Date: January 11, 2020 Session 1 / January 25, 2020 Session 2 / February 8 Session 3

WANTED: 3-4 DRIVEN CAPABLE INDIVIDUALS WHO CAN GET THE JOB DONE. NO QUESTIONS. NO DISINTEGRATIONS. APPLY NOW.
